column4: anyone having problems with the PPA repos? one of mine doesn't seem to be loading anymore
not ppa, but others
- your deb repos are broken?
I'm just re-checking
- my other repos, medi, google, and ubuntu main are all working properly, i only use one PPA, XBMC, and it completely hosed up right now
yes, the german security repo seems down, another works fine now
- hm, i see, but i don't think the PPA is "down" per say, but the output from apt-get doesn't make sense its like its *ignoring* my xbmc ppa
whole line from sources.list ?
- i never see Hit http://ppa.launchpad.net/team-xbmc/ppa/ubuntu/ lucid/main Translation-en_US etc like I expect
-- deb http://ppa.launchpad.net/team-xbmc/ppa/ubuntu karmic ma
sudo add-apt-repository ppa:team-xbmc/ppa
sudo apt-get update
complains about missing key ?
sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys >>Number-from-apt-here<<
- no it doens't complain at all but there is no xbmc in the apt-get update list

- yeah seems like the instructions from http://wiki.xbmc.org/?title=HOW-TO_install_XBMC_for_Linux_on_Ubuntu_with_a_minimal_installation_step-by-step -- which as of like a few weeks ago worked for me everywhere, but tonight something happened and its all busted now
- maybe i can clear stuff out and re-add it somehow?
strange thing, I just ran it myself, it also fetched the key, but no entry in my sources.list
- ok so it isn't just me
- something must be fucked up on the server
something is wrong there, you seem right, keyserver is ub, but not the subdirs of the ppa server http://pastebin.com/iqN9SxKp
- ok well good to know, i've said something in the xbmc channel but no one is alive there out of some near 200 ppl, so i guess just must wait until someone realizes it and fixes it :(
